question: 倒錯
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: When your <kanji>confused</kanji> urges <kanji>overthrow</kanji> normal thoughts and feelings it's a <vocabulary>perversion</vocabulary>. Some are harmless, but some are not.
